thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: Evelyn Alexander

author: Evelyn Alexander
title: Evelyn Alexander
text: I am so pleased that I found Trusted House Sitters (THS) - even if it was only by accident. We do not like to put our cat in a cattery and know that he is much happier and contented in his own surroundings. We were searching the internet for a solution and found THS by chance. And what a find! We have had three wonderful reliable sitters (and a very happy cat) to date during 2016 and already have other sitters lined up for 2017. I have also carried out two sits which have been extremely rewarding experiences. It gives you a super experience to live elsewhere and take care of other people's pets knowing how precious they are to them. We would certainly recommend THS to anybody
